newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK 182-day bills average accepted yield 5.06 pct.
newsitem.headline: HK 182-day bills average accepted yield 5.06 pct.

text.p: The average accepted yield of the 182-day Exchange Fund bills at Tuesday's tender was 5.06 percent, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) said.

This compares with six-month HIBOR of 5.71635 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 5.22 percent at the pervious tender on October 8. Bids for the HK$800 million issue eased to HK$3.27 billion from HK$5.61 billion.

The average accepted yield of 91-day bills was 4.98 percent, compared with three-month HIBOR of 5.55288 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 5.09 percent at the pervious tender on October 15.
Bids for the HK$1.50 billion issue was HK$5.72 billion vs HK$11.43 billion. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6936
